```{r}
library(htmltools)
library(captioner)

fn <- captioner(prefix = "Figure")
tn <- captioner(prefix = "Table")

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, attr.source='.numberLines',  out.width="50%")

image_link <- function(image, ...) {
    htmltools::a(
        href = image,
        target = "_blank",
        htmltools::img(src = image, ...)
    )
}
```
